svg.text: IEEE 802.1CB FRER (Frame Replication and Elimination for Reliability)
무중단 이중화 경로 시각화 - A2Z 자율주행 시스템

g.text: Window Size: 64 frames | History Length: 256 frames
• Primary Path: FAILED (Link Down at SW-A)
Detection Time: 0.1ms | Switch Time: 0.1ms | Total Recovery: 0.3ms
Secondary path immediately took over all traffic
